## Source: amazon-inspector (06d59e051a3b111ec2ba70071d0c2273f89c30a8eb1c6de75cb69d2eefc08b17)
The package faceplate-ui was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (87f7bc99c0edc24c281ba2168534949ba2711d43091502985537d18ceeaffbba)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'faceplate-ui' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
